item.title: Aspose.Email | Java Class Library to Process Outlook Formats
item.description: Java Email API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Email for Java is a complete set of Email Processing APIs to create, read and manipulate emails from within your applications. It makes it easier to work with many Outlook email message formats such as MSG, EML, EMLX and MHT files without the need of installing Microsoft Outlook.

item.title: Download OutlookÂ® Objects Processing C++ DLL | Aspose.Email
item.description: Support Forum Download C++ Library to work with Emails Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Email.Cpp and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Email.Cpp   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Python Email Library | Aspose.Email for Python via .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Email Python Programming Component Please use the following pip command: Release Notes Download > pip install Aspose.Email-for-Python-via-NET   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA General Email Features Create emails containing plain text as well as HTML. Create alternative message bodies.
